# Prohibited Actions

## Security Prohibitions

Users must not access admin functions without proper authorization.
The system must not log sensitive information such as passwords.
API keys must not be exposed in client-side code.

## Data Prohibitions

Personal data must not be shared with third parties without consent.
The system must not store credit card numbers in plain text.
Users must not be able to modify audit logs.

## Operational Prohibitions

The application must not allow concurrent modifications to the same record.
System administrators must not delete production data without approval.
Users must not be able to bypass rate limiting.
